directions: In a large bowl mix together the kidney beans, celery, and grapes. Stir in the creamy salad dressing a little at a time. Adjust the amount of creamy salad dressing to suit your taste.
ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
2 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and diced
1 bunch red globe grapes, halved and seeded
1 1/2 cups creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
title: Holiday Apple Side Salad
